<diagram name="scenario 2" id="Eh0GLjdfo-8qxC7z9V_w"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="2437" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-0" /> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-0" /> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-22" value="kubernetes cluster" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=bottom;fillColor=none;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=default;shadow=0;dashed=1;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="-1010" width="480" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-23" value="Envoy" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220.56" y="-980" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-24" value="Keycloak" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="399.99999999999994" y="-980" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-25" value="<ul style="padding-left: 20px;"><li>Terminates mutually authenticated TLS connection (with proof-of-possession of client key).</li><li>Client&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">authentication fails</font>&nbsp;since XFCC header is not set.</li></ul>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=left;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="570" y="-990" width="340.56" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-26" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" <mxPoint x="236.56" y="-970" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-27" value="mutually authenticated<div>TLS connection</div>" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" source="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-28" target="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-24" edge="1"> <mxGeometry x="0.5745" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-28" value="internal client" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="578" y="-880" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ANmb5cj5D77qwfZRCGBf-29" value=""
